text: Kist sitamgortar az on ki ʙa ojoti Parvardigoras pand doda savad, vale az on ru ʙigardonad va korhoi [zisti] guzastaasro faromus kunad? Mo ʙar dilhojason pardahoe afkandaem, to [pajomi haq]-ro darnajoʙand va dar gushojason sangini [nihodaem, to suxani haqro nasnavand]; va agar ononro ʙa sui hidojat ʙixoni, hargiz hidojat namesavand
